pkgmetadata.longdescription: Archetypoid Algorithms and Anomaly Detection // Collection of several algorithms to obtain archetypoids with small and large databases, and with both classical multivariate data and functional data (univariate and multivariate). Some of these algorithms also allow to detect anomalies (outliers). Please see Vinue and Epifanio (2020) doi:10.1007/s11634-020-00412-9.
